channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's shutdown funding workarounds are on shaky legal ground
item.description: The ways President Trump is moving money around to pay certain federal workers during the government shutdown may be illegal, experts tell Axios. Why ...

item.title: Fall's sports overload is gambling's golden season
item.description: Data: Legal Sports Report; Chart: Axios Visuals The sports equinox, a day when games across the four major sports — the NFL, NBA, MLB and NHL — are sc...

item.title: AI is about to supercharge cyberattacks
item.description: U.S. companies are up against a ticking time bomb: Thanks to AI, hackers are on the verge of launching fully automated cyberattacks that can move fast...

item.title: Black Americans and Latinos feel alienated in Trump's America: poll
item.description: Data: PRRI ; Chart: Axios Visuals Black and Latino Americans are reporting record levels of alienation and pessimism about the nation's direction, as ...

item.title: From budget-friendly Botox to luxury facelifts, America is in its heyday of plastic surgery
item.description: From budget-friendly Botox to luxury facelifts , America is in its heyday of plastic surgery. The pursuit of youth and thinness has never been more ub...

item.title: Kamala Harris says she may run for president again
item.description: “I am not done,” Harris says in the interview with BBC that will air on Sunday.

item.title: Trump raises tariffs on Canada by 10% over Reagan ad
item.description: President Trump had halted trade talks with Canada over a provincial government’s ad that has since been canceled.

item.title: Trump to meet with Xi as he travels to Asia to contain trade war
item.description: The president’s swing through Malaysia, Japan and Korea will also include meetings with allies strained by tariffs.

item.title: NBA’s gambling scandal renews congressional calls to regulate sports betting
item.description: Lawmakers want “safeguards” added after charges are brought against dozens of people, including current and former high-profile NBA figures, in federa...

item.title: Republicans bet frenzied redistricting push can outrun historical trends
item.description: Republicans could gain up to 10 seats through state legislatures drawing new House lines, but it might not be enough to save their majority.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
